jobs.title: Working Student - Social Media & Design (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
TL;DR - Wir entwickeln KI-gestützte Fachkräfte für das Gesundheitswesen von morgen. Unsere KI-Rezeptionistin Luna automatisiert bereits heute die Patientenkommunikation in Arztpraxen. Als Marktführer in der Kieferorthopädie und mit einer großen Finanzierungsrunde im Rücken skalieren wir nun in andere medizinische Fachbereiche - und du bist dabei. Als Working Student für Social Media & Design betreust du unsere sozialen Kanäle und trägst entscheidend zum gesamten Auftritt unseres Unternehmens bei.

Wieso praxipal?

Der Fachkräftemangel ist die größte Herausforderung für unser Gesundheitswesen. Zehntausende Stellen bleiben jedes Jahr unbesetzt und der demographische Wandel sorgt dafür, dass sich diese Entwicklung immer weiter zuspitzen wird. Arztpraxen setzen auf unsere KI-Rezeptionistin Luna, um ihr Personal zu entlasten und die Versorgung für alle zugänglich zu halten. Wir wachsen in Rekordgeschwindigkeit und haben vor kurzem eine Seed-Finanzierungsrunde mit einem der führenden europäischen VC-Investoren abgeschlossen - und wir fangen gerade erst an.

Wir sind ein tech-driven Unternehmen und setzen bewusst auf ein kleines, hochtalentiertes Team. Was uns ausmacht, ist das Tempo und die Intensität, mit der wir arbeiten – aber ebenso wichtig ist uns das Miteinander. Deshalb kommen wir jeden Tag ins Büro: um uns auszutauschen, voneinander zu lernen und gemeinsam zu wachsen. Der Austausch findet bei uns ganz selbstverständlich über Teamgrenzen hinweg statt – im Alltag wirst du dabei vor allem mit Daniel, Julius und Lisa eng zusammenarbeiten.

Wonach wir suchen

  • Gespür für und Spaß an Design

  • Talent für Foto- und Videoaufnahmen

  • Erfahrung mit gängigen Designprogrammen wie Canva und im Schneiden von Videos

  • Erfahrung mit Pflege von privaten oder beruflichen Social Media-Profilen, v.a. Instagram, idealerweise auch LinkedIn

  • Kreativität, Ideenreichtum und ständiges Wissen über neue (Social Media- und Design-) Trends

  • Zuverlässigkeit, Einsatzwille und Eigenständigkeit

  • Berlin als Wohnort und Deutsch auf professionellem Niveau

Was du tun wirst

In einem Satz: du hebst unseren Auftritt durch relevante Inhalte und ansprechende Designs auf ein neues Level.

  • Du pflegst unsere Social Media-Profile, übernimmst regelmäßige Posts und Stories

  • Du bereitest unseren Content-Kalender vor und besprichst diesen zusammen mit dem Team

  • Du produzierst Content - bei uns im Büro, bei Events oder bei unseren Kunden vor Ort

  • Du unterstützt bei der Gestaltung unserer Webseite sowie diversen Marketing- und Vertriebsunterlagen

  • Du interagierst aktiv mit unserer Community

Deine Vorteile

  • 18€ / Stunde bei 15-20 Stunden pro Woche

  • Zusammenarbeit mit starkem, motiviertem Team und viele Wachstumsmöglichkeiten

  • Chance auf eine Festanstellung nach deinem Werkstudium

  • Viele Freiheiten und Raum für Kreativität

  • Urban Sports Club-Abo

  • Lunch-Zuschuss via Lunchit und gemeinsame Abendessen auf Firmenkosten

Als Marktführer in der Kieferorthopädie und mit einer großen Finanzierungsrunde im Rücken skalieren wir nun in andere medizinische Fachbereiche - und du bist dabei. Als Working Student für Social Media & Design betreust du unsere sozialen Kanäle und trägst entscheidend zum gesamten Auftritt unseres Unternehmens bei.

 - Talent für Foto- und Videoaufnahmen

 - Berlin als Wohnort und Deutsch auf professionellem Niveau

In einem Satz: du hebst unseren Auftritt durch relevante Inhalte und ansprechende Designs auf ein neues Level.

 - Du pflegst unsere Social Media-Profile, übernimmst regelmäßige Posts und Stories

 - Du bereitest unseren Content-Kalender vor und besprichst diesen zusammen mit dem Team

 - Du produzierst Content - bei uns im Büro, bei Events oder bei unseren Kunden vor Ort

 - Du unterstützt bei der Gestaltung unserer Webseite sowie diversen Marketing- und Vertriebsunterlagen

 - Du interagierst aktiv mit unserer Community

Deine Vorteile

 - 18€ / Stunde bei 15-20 Stunden pro Woche

 - Zusammenarbeit mit starkem, motiviertem Team und viele Wachstumsmöglichkeiten

 - Chance auf eine Festanstellung nach deinem Werkstudium

 - Viele Freiheiten und Raum für Kreativität

 - Urban Sports Club-Abo

 - Lunch-Zuschuss via Lunchit und gemeinsame Abendessen auf Firmenkosten

jobs.title: GTM Associate (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
TL;DR - We’re building the healthcare workforce for tomorrow. Our AI receptionist Luna is already automating patient communication in medical practices today. As the market leader in orthodontics and with a recent major funding round under our belt, we’re now scaling into additional medical specialties — and you’ll be a key contributor to make that work. As GTM Associate, you’ll help us build a world-class GTM engine and will grow professionally along the way.

Why praxipal? The shortage of skilled professionals is the biggest challenge in our healthcare system. Tens of thousands of positions remain unfilled each year, and demographic shifts are only making things worse. Medical practices rely on our AI receptionist Luna to reduce staff workload and keep care accessible for everyone. We’re growing at record speed and recently closed a $6.7M seed round with HV Capital — and we’re just getting started.

We are a tech-driven company that deliberately relies on a small, talent-dense team. What defines us is the speed and intensity with which we work — but just as important to us is our team spirit. That’s why we come into the office every day: to connect, learn from one another, and grow together. Cross-functional collaboration happens naturally here — in your day-to-day, you’ll work closely with Julius, Lisa and Daniel.

What We’re Looking For

  • First work experience in fast-paced environments, ideally combining generalist and customer-facing roles

  • Extraordinary drive, strong entrepreneurial mindset and a high level of self-motivation

  • Quick to learn and adapt to new roles, tools and automation solutions

  • Natural connector who proactively builds and develops relationships with customers, partners and team members

  • German and English at a professional level

What You’ll Do In one sentence: You’ll help us build a world-class GTM organization, driving impact through killer demos and bold lead-gen plays.

  • You turn customer interest into long-lasting partnerships

  • You represent us at events and establish them as one of our most powerful growth engines

  • You create lead-gen opportunities on your own — full ownership from start to finish

  • You sharpen our processes and play an active role in shaping our go-to-market strategy

  • You use tools to help build an automated growth and sales engine

Your Benefits

  • Competitive salary and participation in our VSOP program

  • Unparalleled learning opportunities at the frontier of AI and healthcare

  • Work alongside a strong, motivated team with ample growth opportunities

  • Urban Sports Club membership

  • Lunch subsidy via Lunchit and daily team dinners covered by the company

jobs.title: Software Engineering Working Student (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About praxipal

At praxipal, we’re building an AI-powered healthcare workforce to address the growing healthcare staff shortage. Our first product, Luna, is an AI receptionist that automates patient communication.

Backed by one of Europe’s leading investors, our team brings together expertise from Palantir, SAP, the University of Cambridge, and Hasso Plattner Institute—driven by a shared goal: to ensure that healthcare gets better, not worse.

Why Join praxipal?

The shortage of skilled workers is the biggest challenge facing our healthcare system. Tens of thousands of positions remain unfilled every year, and demographic change means that this trend will continue to worsen. Medical facilities are relying on our AI receptionist Luna to relieve their staff and keep care accessible to all. We are growing extremely fast and recently completed a seed financing round with one of Europe’s leading investors – and we are just getting started.

Join us to:

  • 🌍 Help us fix healthcare staffing with AI agents.

  • 👥 Be part of an engineering-first team.

  • ⚡ Define how reliable AI agents and voice AI are built.

About the Role

We’re looking for a talented and driven software engineering working student to join our core engineering team. In this role, you will:

  • 🛠️ Expand our platform: Expand and improve our cutting-edge communication and process automation platform in both backend and frontend.

  • ⚙️ Scale our infrastructure: Expand our no-downtime, infinitely scalable stack, delivering robust solutions that handle millions of interactions.

  • 💡 Own your impact: Take full ownership of projects - from proposal and architecture to shipping and maintaining vital components.

You Might Not Be a Fit If:

  • 🤝 You prefer to work alone: Collaboration with the team and customers is key to our success.

  • 🚀 You’re not ready to work hard and grow: We thrive in a fast-paced, high-impact environment.

Our Tech Stack

  • 💻 Programming languages: Python, TypeScript, Rust.

  • 🌐 Infrastructure: Pulumi, K8s, AWS.

  • 🗄️ Databases: Postgres with Prisma.

We ship daily and pride ourselves on building reliable, scalable systems that actually solve problems.

What We Offer

  • 💰 Top-of-class salary: We'll pay you well and if you're great, we'll make you a full-time offer you cannot refuse.

  • 🏢 Office perks: A beautiful workspace in Berlin Mitte, complete with a ping pong table, PlayStation, and VR setup.

  • 🎉 Team bonding: Regular get-togethers and happy hours.

  • 🍎 Health and productivity: Free dinners, subsidized lunches and sponsored gym subscription.

  • ❤️ Impact: Join a mission-driven company where your work will improve healthcare for millions.

Ready to Join Us?

If you’re passionate about building the next generation of technology and want to be part of a team that’s reshaping healthcare, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and let’s create something extraordinary together.

jobs.title: Go-to-Market / Partnerships Intern (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
TL;DR - We’re building the healthcare workforce for tomorrow. Our AI receptionist Luna is already automating patient communication in medical practices today. As the market leader in orthodontics and with a recent major funding round under our belt, we’re now scaling into additional medical specialties. As GTM / Partnerships Intern, you’ll build the partnerships engine that fuels our growth.

Why praxipal? The shortage of skilled professionals is the biggest challenge in our healthcare system. Tens of thousands of positions remain unfilled each year, and demographic shifts are only making things worse. Medical practices rely on our AI receptionist Luna to reduce staff workload and keep care accessible for everyone. We’re growing at record speed and recently closed a $6.7M seed round with HV Capital — and we’re just getting started.

We are a tech-driven company that deliberately relies on a small, talent-dense team. What defines us is the speed and intensity with which we work — but just as important to us is our team spirit. That’s why we come into the office every day: to connect, learn from one another, and grow together. Cross-functional collaboration happens naturally here — in your day-to-day, you’ll work closely with Julius and Daniel.

What We’re Looking For

  • Previous experience in customer-facing roles such as business development, sales, customer success or consulting

  • Extraordinary drive, strong entrepreneurial mindset and a high level of self-motivation

  • Natural connector who proactively builds and develops relationships with customers, partners and team members

  • You keep things running smoothly - highly organized, structured, and always two steps ahead

  • You communicate with clarity and impact - building trust, inspiring confidence, and making complex ideas sound simple

  • German and English at a professional level

  • It’s a plus if you have prior experience with startups, VC or within other fast-paced work environments

What You’ll Do In one sentence: You’ll build our partnerships approach and turn collaboration with industry partners into a sustainable growth engine.

  • You identify potential partners, reach out, and turn first conversations into strong, lasting relationships

  • You manage and deepen relationships with existing partners

  • You design a structured approach to partner communication, making collaboration seamless and scalable

  • You craft an incentive scheme that rewards our industry partners and drives mutual growth

  • You build an automated workflow that calculates and transfers commissions with precision - no friction, no delays

  • You collaborate closely with our leadership team and bring them into senior-level partnership conversations that move the needle

Your Benefits

  • Competitive salary - and if you excel, you’ll have the chance to grow this into a full-time role with us

  • Unparalleled learning opportunities at the frontier of AI and healthcare

  • Work alongside a strong, motivated team with ample growth opportunities

  • Urban Sports Club membership

  • Lunch subsidy via Lunchit and daily team dinners covered by the company

jobs.title: Forward Deployed Engineer (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About praxipal

At praxipal, we’re building an AI-powered healthcare workforce to address the growing healthcare staff shortage. Our first product, Luna, is an AI receptionist that automates patient communication.

Backed by one of Europe’s leading investors, our team brings together expertise from Palantir, SAP, the University of Cambridge, and Hasso Plattner Institute—driven by a shared goal: to ensure that healthcare gets better, not worse.

Why Join praxipal?

The shortage of skilled workers is the biggest challenge facing our healthcare system. Tens of thousands of positions remain unfilled every year, and demographic change means that this trend will continue to worsen. Medical facilities are relying on our AI receptionist Luna to relieve their staff and keep care accessible to all. We are growing extremely fast and recently completed a seed financing round with one of Europe’s leading investors – and we are just getting started.

Join us to:

  • 🌍 Help us fix healthcare staffing with AI agents.

  • 👥 Be part of an engineering-first team.

  • ⚡ Define how reliable AI agents and voice AI are built.

About the Role

We’re looking for a talented and driven forward deployed engineer with prior experience in customer-facing engineering roles to join our customer-facing engineering team. In this role, you will:

  • 🤝 Power GTM with engineering: Support our Marketing, Sales, and Customer Success teams with automations that accelerate our Go-to-Market.

  • 🚀 Lead technical onboarding: Guide new customers through technical onboarding and tailor our AI receptionist to their specific needs.

  • 🧠 Bridge customer needs and engineering: Implement custom solutions for our most important customers and act as a trusted technical partner.

You Might Not Be a Fit If:

  • 🤝 You prefer to work alone: Collaboration with the team and customers is key to our success.

  • 🚀 You’re not ready to work hard and grow: We thrive in a fast-paced, high-impact environment.

  • 👩‍💻 You lack experience in engineering teams: We value candidates who have worked collaboratively in software engineering and can contribute effectively to a team.

Our Tech Stack

  • 💻 Programming languages: Python, TypeScript, Rust.

  • 🤖 Agent Framework: LiveKit.

  • 🌐 Infrastructure: Pulumi, K8s, AWS.

  • 🗄️ Databases: Postgres with Prisma.

We ship daily and pride ourselves on building reliable, scalable systems that actually solve problems.

What We Offer

  • 💰 Competitive salary and equity: We'll match your current compensation.

  • 🏢 Office perks: A beautiful workspace in Berlin Mitte, complete with a ping pong table, PlayStation, and VR setup.

  • 🎉 Team bonding: Regular get-togethers and happy hours.

  • 🍎 Health and productivity: Free dinners, subsidized lunches and sponsored gym subscription.

  • ❤️ Impact: Join a mission-driven company where your work will improve healthcare for millions.

Ready to Join Us?

If you’re passionate about building the next generation of technology and want to be part of a team that’s reshaping healthcare, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and let’s create something extraordinary together.

Join us to:

  • 🌍 Help us fix healthcare staffing with AI agents.

  • 👥 Be part of an engineering-first team.

  • ⚡ Define how reliable AI agents and voice AI are built.

About the Role

We’re looking for a talented and driven forward deployed engineer with 4+ years prior experience in customer-facing engineering roles to join our customer-facing engineering team. In this role, you will:

  • 🤝 Power GTM with engineering: Support our Marketing, Sales, and Customer Success teams with automations that accelerate our Go-to-Market.

  • 🚀 Lead technical onboarding: Guide new customers through technical onboarding and tailor our AI receptionist to their specific needs.

  • 🧠 Bridge customer needs and engineering: Implement custom solutions for our most important customers and act as a trusted technical partner.

You Might Not Be a Fit If:

  • 🤝 You prefer to work alone: Collaboration with the team and customers is key to our success.

  • 🚀 You’re not ready to work hard and grow: We thrive in a fast-paced, high-impact environment.

  • 👩‍💻 You lack experience in engineering teams: We value candidates who have worked collaboratively in software engineering and can contribute effectively to a team.

Our Tech Stack

  • 💻 Programming languages: Python, TypeScript, Rust.

  • 🤖 Agent Framework: LiveKit.

  • 🌐 Infrastructure: Pulumi, K8s, AWS.

  • 🗄️ Databases: Postgres with Prisma.

We ship daily and pride ourselves on building reliable, scalable systems that actually solve problems.

What We Offer

  • 💰 Competitive salary and equity: We'll match your current compensation.

  • 🏢 Office perks: A beautiful workspace in Berlin Mitte, complete with a ping pong table, PlayStation, and VR setup.

  • 🎉 Team bonding: Regular get-togethers and happy hours.

  • 🍎 Health and productivity: Free dinners, subsidized lunches and sponsored gym subscription.

  • ❤️ Impact: Join a mission-driven company where your work will improve healthcare for millions.

Ready to Join Us?

If you’re passionate about building the next generation of technology and want to be part of a team that’s reshaping healthcare, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and let’s create something extraordinary together.

Backed by one of Europe’s leading investors, our team brings together expertise from Palantir, SAP, the University of Cambridge, and Hasso Plattner Institute—driven by a shared goal: to ensure that healthcare gets better, not worse.

About the Role

We’re looking for a talented and driven AI engineer with 4+ years prior experience in fast-paced environments to join our core engineering team. In this role, you will:

  • 🛠️ Build cutting-edge AI agents: Architect, develop and finetune cutting-edge LLM-based AI agents and data extraction systems.

  • 📈 Optimize healthcare processes: Train AI models for medical practices, ensuring optimized appointment scheduling and operational efficiency.

  • 💡 Own your impact: Take full ownership of projects - from proposal and architecture to shipping and maintaining vital components.

You Might Not Be a Fit If:

  • 🤝 You prefer to work alone: Collaboration with the team and customers is key to our success.

jobs.descriptionHtml:
About praxipal

At praxipal, we’re building an AI-powered healthcare workforce to address the growing healthcare staff shortage. Our first product, Luna, is an AI receptionist that automates patient communication.

Backed by one of Europe’s leading investors, our team brings together expertise from Palantir, SAP, the University of Cambridge, and Hasso Plattner Institute—driven by a shared goal: to ensure that healthcare gets better, not worse.

  • 👥 Be part of an engineering-first team.

  • ⚡ Define how reliable AI agents and voice AI are built.

About the Role

We’re looking for a talented and driven software engineer with prior work-experience in fast-paced environments to join our core engineering team. In this role, you will:

  • 🛠️ Expand our platform: Expand and improve our cutting-edge communication and process automation platform in both backend and frontend.

  • ⚙️ Scale our infrastructure: Expand our no-downtime, infinitely scalable stack, delivering robust solutions that handle millions of interactions.

  • 💡 Own your impact: Take full ownership of projects - from proposal and architecture to shipping and maintaining vital components.

If you’re passionate about building the next generation of technology and want to be part of a team that’s reshaping healthcare, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and let’s create something extraordinary together.

jobs.title: Medical Operations (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Medical Operations (m/f/d)

TL;DR - Wir entwickeln KI-gestützte Fachkräfte für das Gesundheitswesen von morgen. Unsere KI-Rezeptionistin Luna automatisiert bereits heute die Patientenkommunikation in Arztpraxen. Als Marktführer in der Kieferorthopädie und mit einer großen Finanzierungsrunde im Rücken skalieren wir nun in andere medizinische Fachbereiche - und du bist an vorderster Front dabei. Du bist das Gesicht gegenüber unseren Kunden und setzt neue Standards für moderne Kundenakquise und -betreuung.


Wieso praxipal?

Der Fachkräftemangel ist die größte Herausforderung für unser Gesundheitswesen. Zehntausende Stellen bleiben jedes Jahr unbesetzt und der demographische Wandel sorgt dafür, dass sich diese Entwicklung immer weiter zuspitzen wird. Arztpraxen setzen auf unsere KI-Rezeptionistin Luna, um ihr Personal zu entlasten und die Versorgung für alle zugänglich zu halten. Wir wachsen in Rekordgeschwindigkeit und haben vor kurzem eine Seed-Finanzierungsrunde in Höhe von $6.7 Millionen mit HV Capital abgeschlossen - und wir fangen gerade erst an.

Wir sind ein tech-driven Unternehmen und setzen bewusst auf ein kleines, hochtalentiertes Team. Was uns ausmacht, ist das Tempo und die Intensität, mit der wir arbeiten – aber ebenso wichtig ist uns das Miteinander. Deshalb kommen wir jeden Tag ins Büro: um uns auszutauschen, voneinander zu lernen und gemeinsam zu wachsen. Der Austausch findet bei uns ganz selbstverständlich über Teamgrenzen hinweg statt – im Alltag wirst du dabei vor allem mit Julius, Lisa und Daniel eng zusammenarbeiten.

Was du tun wirst

  • Du verwandelst Interesse von Ärztinnen und Ärzten in langfristige, erfolgreiche Kundenbeziehungen

  • Du repräsentierst uns auf Konferenzen, Events und Workshops und begeisterst für unsere Vision

  • Du gehst proaktiv auf potenzielle Kunden zu und führst Demos sowie Gespräche bis zum erfolgreichen Abschluss

  • Du arbeitest eng mit Produkt- und Technikteams zusammen, um eine reibungslose Einführung und Integration von Luna sicherzustellen

  • Du stellst sicher, dass Praxen Luna optimal einsetzen und ihre Praxisprozesse durch unsere KI nachhaltig verbessern

  • Du übersetzt Feedback in wertvolle Impulse für unser Produkt- und Engineering-Team.


Wonach wir suchen

  • Erfahrung im Gesundheitswesen (z. B. in einer Praxis oder im Krankenhaus) nach dem Studium

  • Antrieb, das Gesundheitswesen mit künstlicher Intelligenz von Grund auf zu transformieren

  • Exzellente People-Skills und die Fähigkeit, proaktive Beziehungen zu Kunden, Partnern und Kollegen aufzubauen und zu entwickeln

  • Außergewöhnlicher Drive, unternehmerisches Mindset und hohe Eigenmotivation

  • Schnelle Auffassungsgabe und Anpassungsfähigkeit an neue Rollen, Tools und Automatisierungslösungen

  • Deutsch auf muttersprachlichem Niveau und fließendes Englisch

  • Bonus: Erfahrung in Startups, Unternehmensberatung, VC oder anderen dynamischen Umfeldern


Deine Vorteile

  • Kompetitives Gehalt und Beteiligung an unserem VSOP-Programm

  • Zusammenarbeit mit starkem, motiviertem Team und viele Wachstumsmöglichkeiten

  • Urban Sports Club

  • Lunch-Zuschuss via Lunchit und täglich gemeinsame Abendessen auf Firmenkosten

 - Außergewöhnlicher Drive, unternehmerisches Mindset und hohe Eigenmotivation

 - Schnelle Auffassungsgabe und Anpassungsfähigkeit an neue Rollen, Tools und Automatisierungslösungen

 - Deutsch auf muttersprachlichem Niveau und fließendes Englisch

 - Bonus: Erfahrung in Startups, Unternehmensberatung, VC oder anderen dynamischen Umfeldern


Deine Vorteile

 - Kompetitives Gehalt und Beteiligung an unserem VSOP-Programm

 - Zusammenarbeit mit starkem, motiviertem Team und viele Wachstumsmöglichkeiten

 - Urban Sports Club

 - Lunch-Zuschuss via Lunchit und täglich gemeinsame Abendessen auf Firmenkosten

jobs.title: Software Engineering Intern (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About praxipal

At praxipal, we’re building an AI-powered healthcare workforce to address the growing healthcare staff shortage. Our first product, Luna, is an AI receptionist that automates patient communication.

Backed by one of Europe’s leading investors, our team brings together expertise from Palantir, SAP, the University of Cambridge, and Hasso Plattner Institute—driven by a shared goal: to ensure that healthcare gets better, not worse.

Why Join praxipal?

The shortage of skilled workers is the biggest challenge facing our healthcare system. Tens of thousands of positions remain unfilled every year, and demographic change means that this trend will continue to worsen. Medical facilities are relying on our AI receptionist Luna to relieve their staff and keep care accessible to all. We are growing extremely fast and recently completed a seed financing round with one of Europe’s leading investors – and we are just getting started.

Join us to:

  • 🌍 Help us fix healthcare staffing with AI agents.

  • 👥 Be part of an engineering-first team.

  • ⚡ Define how reliable AI agents and voice AI are built.

About the Role

We’re looking for a talented and driven software engineering intern to join our core engineering team for 4-12 months. In this role, you will:

  • 🛠️ Expand our platform: Expand and improve our cutting-edge communication and process automation platform in both backend and frontend.

  • ⚙️ Scale our infrastructure: Expand our no-downtime, infinitely scalable stack, delivering robust solutions that handle millions of interactions.

  • 💡 Own your impact: Take full ownership of projects - from proposal and architecture to shipping and maintaining vital components.

You Might Not Be a Fit If:

  • 🤝 You prefer to work alone: Collaboration with the team and customers is key to our success.

  • 🚀 You’re not ready to work hard and grow: We thrive in a fast-paced, high-impact environment.

Our Tech Stack

  • 💻 Programming languages: Python, TypeScript, Rust.

  • 🌐 Infrastructure: Pulumi, K8s, AWS.

  • 🗄️ Databases: Postgres with Prisma.

We ship daily and pride ourselves on building reliable, scalable systems that actually solve problems.

What We Offer

  • 💰 Top-of-class salary: We'll pay you well during the internship and if you're great, we'll make you an offer you cannot refuse.

  • 🏢 Office perks: A beautiful workspace in Berlin Mitte, complete with a ping pong table, PlayStation, and VR setup.

  • 🎉 Team bonding: Regular get-togethers and happy hours.

  • 🍎 Health and productivity: Free dinners, subsidized lunches and sponsored gym subscription.

  • ❤️ Impact: Join a mission-driven company where your work will improve healthcare for millions.

Ready to Join Us?

If you’re passionate about building the next generation of technology and want to be part of a team that’s reshaping healthcare, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and let’s create something extraordinary together.

jobs.title: AI Engineer (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About praxipal

At praxipal, we’re building an AI-powered healthcare workforce to address the growing healthcare staff shortage. Our first product, Luna, is an AI receptionist that automates patient communication.

Backed by one of Europe’s leading investors, our team brings together expertise from Palantir, SAP, the University of Cambridge, and Hasso Plattner Institute—driven by a shared goal: to ensure that healthcare gets better, not worse.

Why Join praxipal?

The shortage of skilled workers is the biggest challenge facing our healthcare system. Tens of thousands of positions remain unfilled every year, and demographic change means that this trend will continue to worsen. Medical facilities are relying on our AI receptionist Luna to relieve their staff and keep care accessible to all. We are growing extremely fast and recently completed a seed financing round with one of Europe’s leading investors – and we are just getting started.

Join us to:

  • 🌍 Help us fix healthcare staffing with AI agents.

  • 👥 Be part of an engineering-first team.

  • ⚡ Define how reliable AI agents and voice AI are built.

About the Role

We’re looking for a talented and driven AI engineer with prior experience in fast-paced environments to join our core engineering team. In this role, you will:

  • 🛠️ Build cutting-edge AI agents: Architect, develop and finetune cutting-edge LLM-based AI agents and data extraction systems.

  • 📈 Optimize healthcare processes: Train AI models for medical practices, ensuring optimized appointment scheduling and operational efficiency.

  • 💡 Own your impact: Take full ownership of projects - from proposal and architecture to shipping and maintaining vital components.

You Might Not Be a Fit If:

  • 🤝 You prefer to work alone: Collaboration with the team and customers is key to our success.

  • 🚀 You’re not ready to work hard and grow: We thrive in a fast-paced, high-impact environment.

  • 👩‍💻 You lack experience in engineering teams: We value candidates who have worked collaboratively in software engineering and can contribute effectively to a team.

Our Tech Stack

  • 💻 Programming languages: Python, TypeScript, Rust.

  • 🤖 Agent Framework: LiveKit.

  • 🌐 Infrastructure: Pulumi, K8s, AWS.

  • 🗄️ Databases: Postgres with Prisma.

We ship daily and pride ourselves on building reliable, scalable systems that actually solve problems.

What We Offer

  • 💰 Competitive salary and equity: We'll match your current compensation.

  • 🏢 Office perks: A beautiful workspace in Berlin Mitte, complete with a ping pong table, PlayStation, and VR setup.

  • 🎉 Team bonding: Regular get-togethers and happy hours.

  • 🍎 Health and productivity: Free dinners, subsidized lunches and sponsored gym subscription.

  • ❤️ Impact: Join a mission-driven company where your work will improve healthcare for millions.

Ready to Join Us?

If you’re passionate about building the next generation of technology and want to be part of a team that’s reshaping healthcare, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now and let’s create something extraordinary together.
